mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE DATE_FORMAT(birth, '%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m-%d')
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET ENABLED = 0 WHERE LASTTIME <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY)
UPDATE MEMBER SET LASTTIME = NOW() WHERE USERNAME=#{userName}
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, BIRTH, ENABLED) VALUES(#{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{enabled})
mapper.select: SELECT M.USERNAME, M.EMAIL, R.NUM, R.ROLENAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON(M.USERNAME = MR.USERNAME) INNER JOIN ROLE R ON(MR.NUM = R.NUM) WHERE M.USERNAME=#{userName} AND M.PASSWORD=#{password}
